extensionDescription.message: Streamus spremeni YouTube v predvajalnik glasbe, ki ste ga vedno želeli.

nextVideoCommandDescription.message: Pojdi na naslednji posnetek v streamu

previousVideoCommandDescription.message: Pojdi na prejšnji posnetek v streamu

saveVideoCommandDescription.message: Dodaj trenutni posnetek na trenutni seznam predvajanja

copyVideoTitleUrlCommandDescription.message: Kopiraj trenutni naslov in povezavo posnetka

delete.description: Just the singular word, as seen on a button.

banUntilClear.description: Ban means don't allow showing/selection, remove semi-permanently. Clear is synonymous with empty.

clearStream.description: An action -- empty the stream of items

working.description: An action -- Streamus is working/processing something

installed.description: Descriptor on a button, the state of Streamus is now 'installed'

highest.description: Descriptor for top tier quality, 100% highest audio quality. Seen in a drop-down.

auto.description: Descriptor for automatic quality selection. Seen in a drop-down.

lowest.description: Descriptor for lowest quality selection. Seen in a drop-down.

anIssueWasEncounteredWhileAddingYourPlay.message: Prišlo je do težave pri dodajanju vašega seznama predvajanja. Preverite URL?

streamusIsTakingALongTimeToLoad.message: Streamus potrebuje veliko časa, da se naloži. Ponovna naložitev lahko pomaga.

cantDeleteLastPlaylist.message: Ne morem izbrisati zadnjega seznama predvajanja

areYouSureYouWantToDeletePlaylist.message: Ste prepričani, da želite izbrisati seznam predvajanja
areYouSureYouWantToDeletePlaylist.description: This looks like a bit of a sentence fragment, but there's a playlist title which comes afterwards

areYouSureYouWantToClearYourStream.message: Ste prepričani, da želite počistiti vaš stream?

typeToCreateOrFilterPlaylists.message: Pišite, da ustvarite ali filtrirajte sezname predvajanja

channel.description: A noun -- as in a YouTube channel of music

remindClearStream.description: This is a bit of a sentence fragment. It is used as part of a list of reminders. e.g. 'Reminders:  - Remind clear stream'.

remindDeletePlaylist.description: This is a bit of a sentence fragment. It is used as part of a list of reminders. e.g. 'Reminders:  - Remind delete playlist'.

youTubePlayerErrorInvalidParameter.message: Zahtevek vsebuje neveljaven parameter vrednosti. Na primer, ta napaka se pojavi, če ID posnetka nima 11 znakov ali, če ima ID posnetka neveljaven znak, kot je exclamation points ali asteriks.

youTubePlayerErrorVideoNotFound.message: Zahtevan posnetek ni najden. To se pojavi, če je bil posnetek izbrisan ali označen kot zaseben.

youTubePlayerErrorNoPlayEmbedded.message: Zahtevan posnetek ne dovoljuje predvajanja v embedded predvajalnikih.

cantSkipToNextVideo.message: Ne morem skočiti na naslednji posnetek.

cantGoBackToPreviousVideo.message: Ne morem skočiti na prejšnji posnetek.

whyNotAddAVideoFromAPlaylistOr.message: Zakaj nebi dodali posnetka s seznama predvajanja ali

resultsWillAppearAsYouSearch.message: Rezultati se bodo prikazali medtem ko iščete
